verses.content: “Chun, hluo dinga in va kaina rama in zâwm dinga LALPA in Pathienin nangni inchûktir dinga thu a mi pêk, thupêk dâm, thuruot dâm, rorêl dâm chu hieng hi an nih;
nangni le in naupasalhai, in tupahaiin LALPA in Pathien chu an ṭih a, an dam sûng po poa a thu- ruothai po po le a thupêk cheu hi in zâwmna ding le in chêng sâwt theina dingin.

Chuleiin, aw Israel mihai, in tluongtlunga, LALPA, in pi le puhai Pathienin a tiemkam ta cheu angin nênetui le khuoizu luongna rama nasataka in hung pung theina dingin ngai unla, zâwm dingin fîmkhur ro.
“Aw Israel mihai, lo ngai ta u, LALPA ei Pathien chau chu LALPA a nih;
LALPA in Pathien chu in lungril po poin, in lungvar po poin, in hrâtna po poin in hmangai ding a nih.
Chun, hieng thu, vawisûna ka pêk cheu hi in lungrilah châm zing a ta,
in nauhai ṭhahnemngaitakin in- chûktir in ta, in ina in ṭhung lai dâm, lampuia in fe lai dâm, in zâl lai dâm, in tho huna khawm in hril hlak ding a nih.
Inchikna dingin in bânah zem in ta, in mit le mit inkâra chalhrênna dingin a um bawk ding a nih.
In in kawtkhâr biengahai, in kawtkhârahai in ziek ding a nih.
“Chun, LALPA in Pathienin in pu Abraham hai, Isak hai, Jakob hai kuoma inkhâma a pêk cheu ram, in indin ni dêr lo, khaw ropui le mawi- tak tak dâm,
in suksip ni dêr lo, thil ṭha tinrênga sip in dâm, in cho ni dêr lo, tuikhur chosa dâm, in chîng ni dêr lo, grêp huon le Oliv thinghai dâm umnaah a ṭhuoi lût cheu a, in fâk a in tlai hle pha chun,
fîmkhur hle el ro; chuong naw chun, Aigupta rama inthawka suoka inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu cheu LALPA chu theinghil el rawi in tih.
LALPA in Pathien chu in ṭi ding a na, ama rawng chu bâwl in ta, a hming sâlin ṭawng in inkhâm ding a nih.
Pathien dang in vêla mihai pathien chu in biek ding a ni nawh.
Nangni laia um LALPA in Pathien chu Pathien thîkthusie a nih; LALPA in Pathien lung chu in chungah inthawk a ta, leihnuoia inthawk hin sukbohmang el rawi a ti cheu.
“Massaa in fie ang khan LALPA in Pathien chu in fie ding a ni nawh.
LALPA in Pathienin a pêk cheu, thupêk dâm, a thuinhriettir dâm, a thuruot dâm, fîmkhurtakin in zâwm ding a nih.
LALPA mithmua indik le ṭha chu in thaw ding a nih; in tluongtlung theina ding le LALPAIN in pi le puhai kuoma inkhâma a lo tiem tah ram ṭhatak chu in va hluo theina dinga,
in hmêlmahai po po in hmaa hnawt suok dinga LALPAIN a lo hril ta ang khan.

“Chun, in unauhaiin ‘LALPA ei Pathienin thu a pêk cheu thuin- hriettir dâm, thuruot dâm, rorêl dam chu iengtizie am a nih a?’ tih a na- kie hun tienga an la hung indawn cheu chun, nangnîn in nauhai kuomah,
‘Aigupta rama Pharao suok ei na, LALPAIN Aiguptaa inthawk chun kut hrâttakin a mi ṭhuoi suok a;
chun, LALPAIN ei mithmuah Aigupta ram chunga dâm, Pharao chunga dâm, a sûnghai po po chunga dâm, inchikna le thilmak nasatak le lunginzîng umtakhai ân entir a;
eini ruok chu mi pêk dinga ei pi le puhai kuoma ṭawng a lo inkhâm- na, chu ram chu a mi pêk theina dingin chutaka inthawk chu a mi ṭhuoi suok a.
Chuongchun, hieng dânhai po po hi zâwm ding le ei ṭhat zingna dinga LALPA ei Pathien chu ṭi dingin LALPA chun thu a mi pêk a, vawisûn nia anga mi dama a mi hla theina dingin.
A thu mi pêk anga LALPA hmaa a thupêk po po zâwm dinga ei fîmkhur chun ei ta dingin felna a ni ding a nih,’ in ti ding a nih.
